data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Hessen, Germany.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hessen, Germany
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Hessen to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Hessen, Germany that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Hessen that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Hessen, Germany a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Hessen do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hessen, Germany has a population of 6,062,000.

We estimate Hessen has 126,343 people who might know Jesus, 3,587,286 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,348,371 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Hessen, Germany.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
